content.text: Oh cool! I like honey bees too!
They're so important to our ecosystem!
I know! I'm studying to be a vet, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love.
Wow, that's awesome! What's your favorite animal?
Probably cats, or maybe dogs. I have 4 pets, all of them are rescues.
That's great! I have 4 pets too. I love cats. Do you want to talk about honey bees?
Sure! I'm always up for a chat about bees!
